scripts.dev: npm run dev:db && tsx watch --clear-screen=false src/index.ts
scripts.dev:db: npm run prisma:use:sqlite && node scripts/prisma.mjs migrate dev
scripts.dev:reset: npm run prisma:use:sqlite && node scripts/prisma.mjs migrate reset --force
scripts.prod:migrate: npm run prisma:use:postgres && node scripts/prisma.mjs migrate deploy --schema prisma/postgres/schema.prisma
scripts.prod:generate: npm run prisma:use:postgres && node scripts/prisma.mjs generate --schema prisma/schema.postgres.prisma
scripts.db:studio: npm run prisma:use:sqlite && node scripts/prisma.mjs studio
scripts.db:migrate:sqlite-to-postgres: npm run prisma:use:sqlite && node scripts/prisma.mjs generate --schema prisma/schema.sqlite.prisma && npm run prisma:use:postgres && node scripts/prisma.mjs generate --schema prisma/schema.postgres.prisma && tsx scripts/migrate-sqlite-to-postgres.ts --from=sqlite --to=postgres
